content: Dream, dream, dream. Dreams transform into thoughts and thoughts result in action.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: Excellence happens not by accident. It is a process.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: Don’t take rest after your first victory because if you fail in second, more lips are waiting to say that your first victory was just luck.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: All of us do not have equal talent. But, all of us have an equal opportunity to develop our talents.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: Man needs difficulties in life because they are necessary to enjoy success.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: If you want to shine like a sun, first burn like a sun.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: I am not handsome but I can give my hand to someone who needs help. Beauty is in the heart, not in the face.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: If you fail, never give up because FAIL means 'First Attempt In Learning'.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: To succeed in your mission, you must have single-minded devotion to your goal.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: Great dreams of great dreamers are always transcended.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: Thinking is the capital, enterprise is the way, hard work is the solution.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: Science is a beautiful gift to humanity; we should not distort it.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: Be more dedicated to making solid achievements than in running after swift but synthetic happiness.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: Without your involvement you can’t succeed. With your involvement you can’t fail.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: Small aim is a crime; have great aim.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: Climbing to the top demands strength, whether it is to the top of Mount Everest or to the top of your career.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: Do not wait for something big to happen. Start where you are with what you have.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: Your best teacher is your last mistake.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: One best book is equal to a hundred good friends, but one good friend is equal to a library.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: Life is a difficult game. You can win it only by retaining your birthright to be a person.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: Success is when your signature becomes an autograph.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: The bird is powered by its own life and by its motivation.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: If you salute your duty, you no need to salute anybody. But if you pollute your duty, you have to salute everybody.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: Never be a prisoner of your past. It was just a lesson, not a life sentence.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: Don’t read success stories, you will only get a message. Read failure stories, you will get some ideas to get success.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

content: Love your job but don’t love your company, because you may not know when your company stops loving you.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
